name: Martial Morphers
overview: Martial Morphers was released by F1 Licenceware on disk F1-104. Game written in AMOS Professional. Coding by Lee Bamber, it is an IK+ clone, it is also an International Karate + clone, where you control your two fighters simultaneously as a single fighting force. Defeat your enemy, with your ability to control two separate fights at the same time. Both fighters respond to every controller command, creating and easy system that is quickly picked up. The first to achieve 4 knock-out strikes wins a bout. Each match can have 3, 5 or 7 bouts against the computer or an additional human player. Above all, it's a beat'em up like no other, based on accuracy, speed, maneuverability and cunning skill. You will in time, become one with the metal fighters.
